content.rendered:
The University of La Verne offers a distinctive experience steeped in its core values, is known for its caring faculty-student interactions, and is built on strong community engagement. The Office of the Provost provides leadership during a time of rapid growth and evolution as the university continues to advance in national prominence.

The La Verne Experience is enhanced by enthusiastic teacher-scholars, rich student diversity, and expanding community and business partnerships. Led by our strategic vision, the University of La Verne offers a transformative education, grounded in ethics and based on the practical application of knowledge, promoting lifelong reflection, and creativity.
